name: Snack Attack (PizzaKatGames)
description:
Play as one hungry cookie on a quest to get a snack. Get tricked into joining the military where you must battle more vegetable.

Dev Comments. 
This is a very early build and I've been the only one to play test it so apologies if the game crashes while you play!

Currently working on save and load features. Also the pause menu can only be interacted with using WASD or whatever movement keys you assigned, sorry it currently doesn't work with the mouse I'm working on that as well.

The music may sound awkward in places its currently placeholder as I intend to use music of my own production in the future. Feedback is appreciated!
